ngiemboon: À kǔu ndá ńgyá mezsǒ mé nuŋe sate sate.
en: He came in and saw his clothes lying in a mess.

ngiemboon: Lenÿɔ́g mêngáb pɔ́ se múɔ ne ńgyáŋa.
en: The hen's eye and that of the chick are sick.

ngiemboon: À ge kaa pɔ̀ɔn sé pɔ́ se tá we.
en: He will carry his bags and those of his father.

ngiemboon: Pi tó ḿbí se Tâm ńdɔg ńtó.
en: Come take for Tam to bring.

ngiemboon: Tè kwɛ́ legwaʼá shú té kwɛ́ ség.
en: Don’t attach your shelf without attaching ours.

ngiemboon: À lɔɔn shʉ́a lepfo, á ná ségè.
en: If he splits the cola, he gives us ours.

ngiemboon: À nǎ lelÿɔʼ né mèŋ pɔ́ sélémɔʼɔ́.
en: He only gave me a yam.
